ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Quest] Digest Number 102
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I lifted the following text from allakhazam s Web site hope it helps: On the second floor one of the buildings in a small group of buildings to the EAST of
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 1
> Date: Mon, 09 Apr 2001 04:10:26 -0000
> From: ZeonChar@...
>Subject: Tax Quest

>I was wondering about the taxes quest in Qeynos. How do you get the
>final and needed coin from the lady merchant in Qeynos hills? All she
>does is look at my and cry. I've tried everything! Any help would be
>Appreciated. Thanks!

I lifted the following text from allakhazam's Web site hope it helps:

On the second floor one of the buildings in a small group of buildings to
the EAST of "The Lion's Mane Tavern" and to the south of "Nesiff's Wooden
Weapons" and the "Bag and Barrel", you will find a man named Vicus Nonad
with a bad cough. After talking to him for a bit, he will tell you that he
is a tax collecter and needs you to make his runs for him. He will give you
a box, in which to place and combine the taxes, and a scroll with the names
of the people. To get the taxes from the, simply hail them and say "Please
pay your taxes." Doing this will give you a very small lowering of faction
with Qeynos merchants.

Upon going to Mira Sayer, In Qeynos Hills, and asking her to pay, she will
begin to cry. When you ask her why she is crying, she will tell you a
halfling named Flynn something or other stole her tax money. He is in Crow's
Pub in Qeynos. Go to him, hail him, and ask him if he stole Mira's tax
money. He will affirm this, and tell you to say "I am a gnoll loving
weakling and am not worthy to comb your feet" After doing so, he will shout
it, and the entire zone will hear what an idiot you are. He'll give you the
money
